plugins.name: Sketch to Xcode assets catalog
plugins.overview: A Sketch plugin that allows to export assets for iOS directly from Sketch into Xcodes assets catalog

plugins.name: AEIconizer
plugins.overview: This plugin makes your life easy when you need to resize artwork for iOS app icon.
plugins.description:
After creating icon in any square sized artboard, select any layer (or nothing if that's the only artboard on page), then run this plugin to generate all of the needed sizes for iOS.

Plugin replaces all generated artboards every time it runs, but it will never delete your original artboard.

plugins.name: Sketch States Switch
plugins.overview: A tool to save and switch states for quick demo purpose, Sketch 3.0.2+ support.
plugins.description: Save different states of your sketch files (the visibility of layers and layergroups) and switch between those saved states when you demo it in a meeting or something.

plugins.name: Generate Animated GIF
plugins.overview: Sketch.app plugin for generating animated GIFs from a sequence of artboards.

plugins.name: Clear Styles
plugins.overview: Sketch.app plugin for clearing all layer style properties.

plugins.name: Swap Fill & Border
plugins.overview: Sketch.app plugin for swapping the fill and border color for all selected layers.

plugins.name: Sync Plugins
plugins.overview: Sync local Sketch.app plugins with their master version at GitHub.

plugins.name: Page Switch Plugin
plugins.overview: A dummy plugin to quickly switch between pages using keyboard shortcuts.

plugins.name: Color Contrast Analyser
plugins.overview: A Sketch plugin that calculates the color contrast of two selected layers and evaluates it against the WCAG
plugins.description:
The test may pass AAA, AA or fail because of a lack of contrast. And even when you do not need to meet those requirements, you can get a feeling for the contrast when you get used to the values. This might help you design accessible content.

Note: This plugin works with solid text and fill colors. Transparency is not supported yet.

plugins.name: AEFlowchart
plugins.overview: The idea of this plugin is to make it fast and easy to draw flowcharts in Sketch, because why not?
plugins.description:
Basically, you add some text labels, convert them to appropriate flowchart shapes and then connect them.

You can see it in more detail on [Vimeo](https://vimeo.com/tadija/aeflowchart).

plugins.name: Generate ICNS
plugins.overview: Generate an Apple Icon Image (.icns) from a sequence of artboards OR automatically

plugins.name: Sketch Dockpreview
plugins.overview: A Sketch plugin that lets you preview your current artboard in the Dock.
plugins.description:
#### Usage
Press `⇧⌘D` (*Shift + Command + D*) to preview your work in the dock. Artboards are required.

plugins.name: Day Player
plugins.overview: A collection of Sketch Plugins for creating placeholder images.
plugins.description:
#### What Does It Do?
It allows you to insert a customized placeholder image into any Sketch document from a number of different placeholder image services.
* [placehold.it](http://placehold.it)
* [lorempixel.com](http://lorempixel.com)
* [fillmurray.com](http://fillmurray.com)
* [placecage.com](http://placecage.com)

plugins.name: Auto Export Assets to Xcode
plugins.overview: Automatically Exporting Assets from Sketch into Xcode.
plugins.description: Not a sketch plugin at all, but awesome for Cocoa developers.

plugins.name: Content Generator
plugins.overview: Sketch generator allows you quickly create dummy data such as avatars, names, geo location data etc.
plugins.description:
#### Upcoming features
* Shortcut for repeating last action
* More types of data
* Fetch content directly from different online sources
* Installation and customization panel
* Easier extensibility
* Sketch 2.x support

plugins.name: Android Assets
plugins.overview: Generate Android assets in Sketch.

plugins.name: Sketch Commands
plugins.overview: A collection of script commands and keyboard shortcuts for Sketch.
plugins.description: It's a port of Ale Muñoz's [Orange Commands for Fireworks](http://orangecommands.com) for Bohemian Coding’s [Sketch.app](http://bohemiancoding.com/sketch/).

plugins.name: Measure
plugins.overview: Measure tools for sketch.app
plugins.description: Generate specifications for layers including size, color and font.

plugins.name: Framer
plugins.overview: Export documents into [FramerJS](http://framerjs.com/) to make interactive prototypes.
plugins.description: Create your layered Sketch file, and save it somewhere. Run the plugin from the plugins menu. The framer prototype will be generated in a folder right next to where the Sketch file is saved

plugins.name: Dynamic Button
plugins.overview: Dynamic button plug-in for [Sketch.app](http://bohemiancoding.com/sketch/) allows to create buttons with fixed paddings no matter what text you add.

plugins.name: Generator
plugins.overview: This command is a recreation for Sketch of the Photoshop Generator functionality introduced by Adobe on Photoshop CC (see [this blog post on Adobe](http://blogs.adobe.com/photoshopdotcom/2013/09/introducing-adobe-generator-for-photoshop-cc.html) for more information).
plugins.description:
####What is this?
If you've ever had to prepare a screen design for production use, you know how painful and time consuming it is: creating slices, naming them, making sure they're properly aligned, painstakingly exporting assets...

Well, it's 2013, and slicing images is so last century. Computers were invented to let us work less and spend more time watching kitten videos, so get ready to reclaim some of your precious time back.

Sketch Generator will let you export all your assets, no matter how complex your design, with a single keystroke. Forget about slicing, exporting, or moving files manually: welcome to the future, where everything that can be made automatically is made automatically :)

plugins.name: Skrx
plugins.overview: Skrx ( ~skreecks ) exports a selection of elements (for now only the rectangles) to Apache Flex MXML or FXG description, and copy it to clipboard.

plugins.name: Lorem-Ipsum
plugins.overview: This is a plugin for quickly creating Lorem Ipsum text in Sketch.

plugins.name: Random Colored Box Grid
plugins.overview: This plugin example creates a square group of boxes whose colors are randomly selected from three preset colors.

plugins.name: Colorful Gradients
plugins.overview: Import colorful gradients as shape fills.

plugins.name: Subtle Patterns
plugins.overview: Import subtle patterns as shape fills.

plugins.name: Sketch i18n
plugins.overview: Translate pages in Sketch.
plugins.description: Sketch i18n enables you to generate translation files for a page and translate it. It acts in a non-destructive way so you can easily undo your changes later.

plugins.name: Sketch Vertical Teleporter
plugins.overview: Moves selected layers vertically according to the cursor position.

plugins.name: Better Paste
plugins.overview: Paste as it was meant to be -- into the artboard you're viewing, not some random artboard far away.

plugins.name: Relabel Button
plugins.overview: Just type the new text for your button and it resizes automatically, preserving the existing padding. Here's a [quick demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=14IKFvKiNqM).
